description: This file initializes a YouTube knowledge base, sets up an agent with this knowledge, and runs an asynchronous query to generate a response based on the videos' content.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with a knowledge base and performs responses.

classes.name: YouTubeKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that fetches and processes content from YouTube videos.

classes.name: YouTubeReader
classes.description: A component that reads and chunks YouTube video content.

classes.name: Qdrant
classes.description: A vector database client used for storing and retrieving embeddings.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the data.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Generates and prints a response based on the knowledge base content.
